name: The One Chapter 1
description:
Play as a hero who goes on an adventure in a fantasy world. There are 40 CGs and 20 animated hot scenes in all. Contains mature content, 18 and older only.

FEATURES

8 Fuckable Characters

20 Animated Hot Scenes
Hours of playing time, and steamy stories that are decided by your choices
Windows, Mac Available
